channel.title: fast on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in fast on Barefoot Rob

item.title: fasted yesterday
item.description: 07:55 Monday 02 September 2019 JST After having eaten extra ice cream and stuff late at night on the 31st, I fasted yesterday. Pretty easy, though I worked out at SOGO. Usually that would make me woozy if I hadn’t eaten, but yesterday seemed fine. I have a bit of a headache now, which may be related to fast, or eat, or not enough water, or upcoming (first) session with Dean

item.title: Letterman and the fast
item.description: 11:37 Tuesday 19 September 2017 JST Yeah so I ate too much yesterday and planned to fast today. But Letterman appeared and ripped the E from his sweater and Tariq took me to brunch after our lesson. I walked too close to my next lesson and was spotted so now I am at B where I will teach at 2pm, about to chow their scrumptious lunch. Oh, and all of this was after I discovered the lunch delivery was not cancelled yesterday for the holiday.

item.title: slow day today
item.description: ##20:35 Sunday 22 March 2015 JST## Today has seemed very slow because Lin and I are fasting! Looks like we survived; she’s in gettin’-ready-for-bed mode, and I’m like meh; not that hungry anymore.
